legal.privacyContent:
Last Updated: October 2023

At OrbitPDF, we prioritize your privacy. Since our tools run entirely in your browser (client-side), your files never leave your device. We do not upload, store, or process your documents on any server.

1. Data Collection

We do not collect personal data or file content. We may use anonymous analytics (like Google Analytics) to improve site performance.

2. Cookies

We use local storage to save your preferences (e.g., dark mode). Third-party vendors may use cookies to serve ads based on visits.
legal.termsContent:
Last Updated: October 2023

By using OrbitPDF, you agree to these terms. Our tools are provided "as is" without warranty of any kind.

1. Usage

You may use our tools for personal or commercial purposes. You are responsible for the content you process.

2. Limitations

We are not liable for any data loss or damages resulting from the use of our tools. Always keep backups of your original files.

guides.title: OrbitPDF User Guides
guides.subtitle: Master every tool in our suite with these quick, professional tutorials.

merge.title: How to Merge Multiple PDFs into One Master File
merge.intro: Combine separate reports, contracts, or project files into a single, organized PDF document. Perfect for streamlining your workflow and sharing unified documents.
steps: Click on **PDF Fusion Deck** in the main menu.
Drag and drop or select **two or more PDF files** you wish to combine.
Use the **Up/Down arrows** to rearrange the file order as needed.
Click **Merge PDFs** to instantly create your unified document.

split.title: How to Split PDF Pages or Extract Ranges
split.intro: Extract specific pages like invoices or chapters from a large document, or burst the entire PDF into separate files.
steps: Select the **PDF Page Splitter** tool.
Upload your PDF file.
Choose **Extract Pages** to save specific pages (e.g., "1-5, 8"), or **Burst All** to separate every page.
Click **Process** to download your new file(s).

compress.title: How to Compress PDFs for Email & Web
compress.intro: Reduce PDF file size significantly without compromising readability. ideal for email attachments and faster web loading.
steps: Open the **Hyper-Compress PDF** tool.
Upload the large PDF file you need to shrink.
Select a preset: **Recommended** (balanced), **Extreme** (smallest size), or **High Quality**.
Click **Compress** and download your optimized PDF.

word-to-pdf.title: How to Convert Word (Docx) to Professional PDF
word-to-pdf.intro: Transform editable Word documents into secure, professional PDFs that look the same on every device.
steps: Select **Docx to PDF Pro**.
Upload your Microsoft Word (.docx or .doc) file.
The tool will automatically convert your document while preserving formatting.
Click **Download PDF** to save your new file.

pdf-to-word.title: How to Convert PDF to Editable Word Document
pdf-to-word.intro: Turn static PDFs back into editable Word documents to make quick text updates or repurpose content.
steps: Choose **PDF to Word Doc** from the tools list.
Upload the PDF you want to edit.
Wait for the conversion to extract text and layout.
Download the **.docx** file and open it in Microsoft Word.

pdf-to-excel.title: How to Extract Tables from PDF to Excel
pdf-to-excel.intro: Stop retyping data! Instantly convert PDF tables into editable Excel spreadsheets for analysis.
steps: Open **PDF Table Extractor**.
Upload your PDF containing financial reports or data tables.
The tool will intelligently identify and export the tabular data.
Download your **.xlsx** file to start analyzing in Excel.

pdf-to-img.title: How to Save PDF Pages as High-Res Images
pdf-to-img.intro: Convert specific PDF pages into high-quality JPG images for easy sharing on social media or presentations.
steps: Select the **PDF to Image HD** tool.
Upload your PDF document.
The tool converts each page into a high-resolution JPG image.
Download the images individually or as a ZIP archive.

pdf-to-png.title: How to Convert PDF to Lossless PNG
pdf-to-png.intro: Extract pages as crisp, background-free PNG files. Ideal for graphic designers needing lossless quality.
steps: Go to **PDF to PNG Lossless**.
Drop your PDF file into the upload area.
The conversion process preserves maximum detail/transparency where possible.
Download your **.png** files.

img-to-pdf.title: How to Combine Images into a PDF Portfolio
img-to-pdf.intro: Merge photos, scans, or diagrams into a single, clean PDF document for professional presentation.
steps: Open **Image to PDF Binder**.
Select multiple image files (JPG, PNG).
Order them as you like – they will each become one page.
Click **Create PDF** to bundle them into a single file.

ocr.title: How to Make Scanned PDFs Searchable (OCR)
ocr.intro: Unlock text in scanned documents. Use OCR to make text selectable, reachable, and copyable.
steps: Select **PDF Text Recognizer**.
Upload your scanned or image-based PDF.
Select the document **Language** (e.g., English, Spanish) for best accuracy.
Click **Start OCR** to generate a text-selectable PDF.

rotate.title: How to Fix PDF Page Orientation
rotate.intro: Permanently rotate PDF pages that are upside down or sideways to ensure proper readability.
steps:
Choose **PDF Page Rotator**.',
            'Upload the file with incorrect orientation.',
            'Select **90°**, **180°**, or **270°** rotation.',
            'Click **Rotate** to save the corrected file.

page-number.title: How to Add Page Numbers to PDF
page-number.intro: Add professional page numbering (Header or Footer) to organize long contracts or thesis documents.
steps: Open **PDF Page Numbering**.
Upload your document.
Choose position: **Top (Header)** or **Bottom (Footer)**.
Click **Apply** to stamp page numbers on every page.

sign.title: How to E-Sign PDF Documents
sign.intro: Draw your digital signature and place it on contracts or forms without printing.
steps: Go to **PDF E-Signature**.
Draw your signature on the pad or upload a signature image.
Select the page and position (e.g., Last Page, Bottom Right).
Click **Sign PDF** to finalize the document.

organize.title: How to Reorder and Delete PDF Pages
organize.intro: Take control of your PDF structure. Visually rearrange, remove, or sort pages in seconds.
steps: Select **PDF Page Organizer**.
Upload your PDF to see a grid view of all pages.
**Drag and drop** pages to reorder, or click **Trash** to delete unwanted pages.
Click **Save** to enable your new page order.

watermark.title: How to Watermark PDFs for Branding & Security
watermark.intro: Protect your intellectual property by stamping logos or "Confidential" text across your pages.
steps: Choose **PDF Brand Stamper**.
Upload your file and choose **Text** or **Image** watermark.
Customize position (e.g., Center, Tiled), opacity, and rotation.
Click **Apply Watermark** to protect your document.

edit-metadata.title: How to Edit PDF Title, Author, and Content
edit-metadata.intro: Update hidden PDF properties (Metadata) like Author and Title to improve file organization and SEO.
steps: Open **PDF Meta Editor**.
Upload your PDF.
Edit fields like **Title**, **Author**, **Subject**, and **Keywords**.
Click **Save Metadata** to update the file properties.

flatten.title: How to Flatten PDF Forms and Comments
flatten.intro: Lock fillable forms and annotations so the content can no longer be edited by others.
steps:
Select **PDF Flattener Tool**.',
            'Upload your interactive PDF or form.',
            'Click **Flatten PDF**.',
            'The output will have all content merged into the base layer.

trim.title: How to Crop PDF Margins
trim.intro: Remove excess whitespace or crop visible areas to refine the layout for printing.
steps: Go to **PDF Smart Crop**.
Upload your file.
Enter the crop values (margins) for Top, Bottom, Left, and Right.
Click **Crop** to resize the pages.

compare.title: How to Visually Compare Two PDFs
compare.intro: Spot the differences between two versions of a document side-by-side.
steps: Select **PDF Visual Diff**.
Upload **Version A** (Original) and **Version B** (Modified).
The tool will generate a comparison file highlighting changes.
Download the comparison report.

protect.title: How to Password Protect a PDF
protect.intro: Secure sensitive documents with military-grade AES encryption and a unique password.
steps: Open **PDF Secure Vault**.
Upload the document you want to lock.
Enter a strong **Password**.
Click **Encrypt** to secure the file.

unlock.title: How to Unlock a Password-Protected PDF
unlock.intro: Remove known passwords from PDFs to make them easier to access and share.
steps: Select **PDF Password Remover**.
Upload the locked PDF.
Enter the current password one last time.
Click **Unlock** to save a permanent, unsecured copy.

repair.title: How to Repair Corrupted PDF Files
repair.intro: Attempt to recover data from damaged or unopenable PDF files.
steps: Choose **PDF File Repair**.
Upload the corrupted file.
Toggle **Force Rebuild** if it is severely damaged.
Click **Repair** and try opening the result.

grayscale.title: How to Convert PDF to Grayscale
grayscale.intro: Remove all color from a PDF for cheaper black-and-white printing or archival.
steps:
Select **PDF Grayscale Converter**.',
            'Upload your color PDF.',
            'Click **Convert**.',
            'Download the high-contrast black and white version.

invert-colors.title: How to Invert PDF Colors (Night Mode)
invert-colors.intro: Switch white backgrounds to black for comfortable reading in low-light environments.
steps: Open **PDF Night Mode**.
Upload your document.
Click **Invert** to flip all colors.
Download the dark-mode friendly version.

extract-text.title: How to Scrape Text from PDF
extract-text.intro: Pull raw text content out of a PDF into a simple text file for copying or coding.
steps:
Go to **PDF Text Scraper**.',
            'Upload your PDF.',
            'The tool extracts all legible text streams.',
            'Download the result as a **.txt** file.

remove-annotations.title: How to Remove Comments from PDF
remove-annotations.intro: Clean up a document by stripping out all user comments, highlights, and markup.
steps: Select **Clean PDF Markup**.
Upload the annotated PDF.
Click **Clean**.
Get a pristine version free of all editor marks.

redact.title: How to Permanently Redact PDF Text
redact.intro: Safely blackout sensitive information like SSNs or names so they cannot be recovered.
steps: Open **PDF Secure Redact**.
Upload your file.
Enter the **text terms** you want to redact (comma separated).
Click **Redact** to permanently blackout those words.

pdf-to-ppt.title: How to Convert PDF to PowerPoint Slides
pdf-to-ppt.intro: Turn your PDF presentation back into an editable PowerPoint slideshow.
steps: Select **PDF to PowerPoint**.
Upload your PDF.
The tool converts pages into slides.
Download the **.pptx** file for Microsoft PowerPoint.

excel-to-pdf.title: How to Convert Excel Sheets to PDF
excel-to-pdf.intro: Share spreadsheets securely by converting them into uneditable, standardized PDFs.
steps:
Determine **Excel to PDF Converter**.',
            'Upload your .xlsx or .xls file.',
            'The tool fits your sheets to PDF pages.',
            'Download the professional report.

ppt-to-pdf.title: How to Save PowerPoint as PDF
ppt-to-pdf.intro: Ensure your presentation looks perfect on any screen by saving it as a PDF.
steps: Open **PowerPoint to PDF**.
Upload your .pptx presentation.
Wait for the conversion.
Download the handout-ready PDF.

html-to-pdf.title: How to Save Web Pages as PDF
html-to-pdf.intro: Capture articles, receipts, or websites as clean offline PDF documents.
steps: Choose **Web to PDF Capture**.
Upload the HTML file (save the webpage as .html first).
The tool renders the page into a PDF.
Download your document.

processor.clientSideDesc: To ensure privacy, this conversion happens entirely in your browser. Complex layouts may shift slightly.
processor.textExtractionDesc: Based on simple text extraction. Images and complex layouts may not be preserved perfectly.
processor.ocrDesc: Select the primary language of your document for best accuracy.
processor.separatePdf: Save every page as a separate PDF file (ZIP).
processor.processingDesc: Crunching data locally on your device.
processor.readyDesc: Your file is ready for download.
processor.compressionDesc: To maximize compression, this tool converts PDF pages into optimized images. Text will no longer be selectable.
processor.encryptDesc: Your password will be used to encrypt the document. There is no way to recover the password if you forget it.
processor.encryptWarning: To enable encryption, this tool converts your PDF pages into images. Text will no longer be selectable.
processor.unlockDesc: Enter the password to remove encryption.
processor.unlockWarning: To remove security, we must rebuild the file as images. Text will no longer be selectable.
processor.repairDesc: We will attempt to rebuild the internal structure of your PDF. This can fix files that fail to open or have corrupt metadata.
processor.deepRepairDesc: Converts pages to images to fix severe corruption. Text will not be selectable.
processor.grayscaleDesc: We will convert all pages to Black & White images. This reduces file size and saves colored ink.
processor.grayscaleWarning: To apply the filter, pages are converted to images. Text will no longer be selectable.
processor.invertDesc: We will invert all colors (white becomes black). Great for comfortable night reading.
processor.invertWarning: To apply the filter, pages are converted to images. Text will no longer be selectable.
processor.ocrDesc2: We will scan your document to recognize text. The result will be a PDF where you can select, copy, and search text.
processor.extractTextDesc: We will extract all text from the PDF and save it as a simple .txt file. Images and formatting will be ignored.
processor.removeAnnotationsDesc: We will strip all comments, highlights, sticky notes, and form fields from the document. The main content (text & images) will remain untouched.
processor.redactionDesc: We will find the text, black it out, and then rasterize the page. The underlying text will be permanently destroyed.
processor.redactNumbersDesc: Automatically black out all numeric digits (0-9).
